commit.message:
HTTP Systems and Login (#71)

* Added OFL font for use in UI
* Added Basic UI Plugin and layout example of login page
* Made first iteration of request system, currently blocks
* Moved to async solution
* Moved to arc mutex in component
* Update .gitattributes
* Initial UI
* Web account registration
* Update login hyperlinks | Fixup unstaged files
* added password font
* Fixup secure password field
* Formatted and linted
* Added HTTP system testing
* Added login tests
* Formatted and linted
* Applied release clippy fixes
* Fixed new package requirement on pipeline
* Improved url conversion and reconfigured fmt
* Applied clippy
* PR feedback, fixed dockerfile, gitattr, and made json manip functions safer
* Formatted
* Handled possible malformed json responses

Co-authored-by: Christopher Miller <admin@mctherealm.net>
Co-authored-by: torresed <torrese@ufl.edu>
